name: WKUserScript
desc: A script that the web view injects into a webpage.

items.name: init(source: String, injectionTime: WKUserScriptInjectionTime, forMainFrameOnly: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a user script object that contains the specified source code and attributes.

items.name: init(source: String, injectionTime: WKUserScriptInjectionTime, forMainFrameOnly: Bool, in: WKContentWorld)
items.desc: Creates a user script object that is scoped to a particular content world.

items.name: var injectionTime: WKUserScriptInjectionTime
items.desc: The time at which to inject the script into the webpage.

items.name: enum WKUserScriptInjectionTime
items.desc: Constants for the times at which to inject script content into a webpage.

items.name: var isForMainFrameOnly: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to inject the script into the main frame or all frames.
